XML Slideshow with Ken Burns effect
The "XML Slideshow with Ken Burns effect" can be the ultimate tool for your website. You can use it as a header, a banner, a slideshow, a gallery, or whatever you want.

Simple Fading Transition
The transition is a simple fading one, putting all the focus on the content.
Every photo stays on the stage a specific amount of time set by you.
<font color="#FFCC00">Every picture can have a hyperlink, which will open a new page set by you.</font>

HTML text for every image
Each image can have it's own html text set by you in the xml file. You can adjust colors, have underlined font, and even hyperlinks

Awesome Ken Burns effect
The Ken Burns effect is what makes this slideshow really cool. For every picture you can set up a different effect. You can control the panning directions and also the zoom in/out effect.
